attributes.additional_details:
We the people require Parliament and HM Government to repeal the passing of all acts associated with the so called Treaty of Lisbon.
We further require them to desist from making any further payments to the EU or any of its organisations, until such time as the EU Court of Auditors approves the accounts of the EU.
We further require them to enshrine, in UK law, the so called 'Thatcher rebates' so that no future government can give these up.
We further require that HM government review all EU Directives that have been implemented, without the scrutiny of the UK parliament and repeal all such directives and then bring all forward for debate and vote and then possible enactment as a UK law directives
